text: Amina Vladikovna Anshba (; born 9 September 1999) is a Russian tennis player. Anshba has career-high WTA rankings of 308 in singles and 233 in doubles, both achieved on 29 October 2018. She has won two singles titles and eight doubles titles on tournaments of the ITF Women's Circuit. Anshba won her biggest ITF title at the 2019 Reinert Open in Versmold, Germany in the doubles event partnering Anastasia Dețiuc. ==ITF finals== {|class="wikitable" !
